arm_group.description: DNA vaccine prime at week 0,4,8 and rTV boost at week 16
DNA vaccine prime at week 0,4,8 and rTV boost at week 24
DNA vaccine prime at week 0,4,8 and rTV boost at week 32
DNA vaccine prime with the addition of electroporation at week 0, 4, 8 and rTV boost at week 24

brief_summary.textblock:
This trial studies the safety and immunogenicity of a HIV clade B'/C DNA vaccine followed by
      recombinant vaccinia virus rTV boost in HIV-uninfected healthy volunteers at low or high
      risk of HIV infection. In addition, the effect of different intervals of the prime-boost
      will be studied.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity Study of AIDS Vaccine (Combined Use of DNA Vaccine and Recombinant Vaccinia Virus Tiantan)

intervention.intervention_name: DNA vaccine prime with the addition of electroporation

clinical_study.official_title: Phase IIa Study of AIDS Vaccine (Combined Use of DNA Vaccine and Recombinant Vaccinia Virus Tiantan)

overall_official.affiliation: Beijing You'an Hospital, Capital Medical University
Beijing You'an Hospital, Capital Medical University

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence, intensity and relationship to vaccination of local and general adverse events
Occurrence and relationship to vaccination of any serious AEs (SAEs)
Occurrence, intensity and relationship to vaccination of clinically significant abnormal haematology and biochemistry values (grade 4)
test HIV specific T cell response by ELISPOT
test HIV specific antibody by ELISA
Occurrence, intensity and relationship to vaccination of local and general adverse events
